website_summaries.verdict: A rugged tool from a reputable manufacturer that's built to last. Superior tech support. The best available for most log-splitting tasks.
cons: Assembly required, but it's easy to put together
A few reports of quality control issues

customer_reviews.title: The price is amazing......seems to get cheaper as the days go by.....a precision machine......my favorite tool now!!
customer_reviews.text: A workhorse....why did I wait so long...been bucking firewood for 45 years.....this is the bomb....love it...just keep checking the hydraulic fluid....and be sure the breather valve is open a couple of turns....when there is no air appearing in the clear hose....it's operating at max then.....be patient....if it's not performing it's the fluid....took me about 4 times checking the fluid......adding a little at a time...just stick in the dipstick....and continue pouring in fluid un til it's at the top of the stick.....means no air in the system.....you're there then!! I'm splitting 24" fir rounds ....all day long.....you all will be so surprised......worth every penny.....get it.....you will just be laughing all day as you split......so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience with this, Most expensive 5 minutes of my life.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible used on small fir for 5 minutes never worked since. Tried to work with champion several times. They said there is an oil sending switch that shuts it off after 5 minutes if oil is not full and to bypass it and see if it works. Didn’t work, took it to tractor supply service and they wouldn’t work on it because the engine has low compression and will never work properly. I know it had oil when I started it because I work fuel oil and hydraulics for my career. Need to get champion to replace the motor. I have been dealing with champion for 6 months now it is Amazons turn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHAMPION 7-TON's of FUN
customer_reviews.text: If your plan is to put-up a years worth of home heating wood this isn't the choice. If your plan is to have a handy gas wood splitter that takes up little floor space and cracks through any logs up to 19 inches in length, this is perfect. Assembly is easy but for one point : If the high pressure hose is hard to align to the lower connection, merely disconnect the hose at the top end, install the lower connection first, then re-connect the upper part. I've put-up two cords and this little unit works great. Put-in the engine oil and hydraulic fluid as directed, fuel-up, retire the axe and "Happy Splitting"
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Day

customer_reviews.title: Buy 2 gallons of Hydraulic Oil
customer_reviews.text: This splitter works great. It took all of the gallon of oil I bought and part of another. It seems to lose/use/leak some so I have to top off occasionally . Watch for bubbles in the clear line from the cylinder to the pump and add oil when you see that. This thing handles everything I have tried to split with ease. "Like Butter" according to my little Italian wife. The small engine is easy to start and runs a long time on a tank of gas. Use ethanol stabilizer so you don't gum the carb when storing for long periods. It's pretty quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Miller

customer_reviews.title: good value and runs well
customer_reviews.text: Runs well. We've split two cords so far and no problem splitting large ash logs. A few minor problems at the beginning. On assembly, instructions for hydraulics were not all that clear. For some reason it took about 1 1/2 gallons hydraulic fluid rather than 0.9 gallons before we got splitting power, and instructions for bleeding air were unclear. I had to look online. It was missing a locknut to hold end on the hydraulic shaft and I could not find a metric locknut at our hardware store. I had to change nut and bolt to US.
customer_reviews.author: J Brad Kallmyer

customer_reviews.title: Small But Mighty
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small log splitter i could move around easy from place to place and this is a perfect fit. it took about an hour to put together which was very simple. once i purged all the air from the system i tested it out i the biggest piece og hard wood i had an almost 2 foot across oak, i cracked it apart like it was nothing, i did have to split the log into many small pieces but it was no problem, either i almost never write a review of what i buy on amazon but if you need a small log spillter with the power of a large one. this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Weak splitter
customer_reviews.text: After hours of research I decided to purchase this splitter. Main issues I have are that it takes multiple attempts to start motor. When it finally runs, it struggles to split wood. The engine pulsates as if it is running out of fuel then starts again. The motor actually stops half way through a cut and I have to restart it. I feel that the motor is cheap and it would be a better product with a Honda motor. Overall design seems to be good, just a weak motor that can’t keep up. Maybe I will go back to using my axe.
customer_reviews.author: Craig levitt

customer_reviews.title: This is a small but mighty powerful wood splitter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he wanted a wood splitter. When it arrived, he wondered what was I thinking but then he used it and could not believe the size of wood this little wood splitter would split. In one afternoon he split enough wood to put 2 tiers in our woodshed. He was amazed, happy and said thank you for buying it for him. If you need a wood splitter but don't want to break the bank I would highly recommend this one and so would my husband.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Would never purchase a Champion product again
customer_reviews.text: The first season it ran great. It was stored indoors for the winter and the fuel was drained out of the machine and carburetor. Next season, oil changed, spark plug changed, air filter changed, fueled with premium gas and stabilizer. The machine starts, runs for a few minutes and dies. I have spent 2 days all day long, starting it over and over again, blisters on my hands from the pull start and I have split approximately a quarter of a cord in this time frame. I would never recommend this machine to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Is Better Then Batman

customer_reviews.title: Great Lil splitter
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's small, and light weight, but it's a powerhouse for it's size. Split a full cord in about an hour, nonstop. some logs 19 inches long and at least 14 across. used 1 full tank of gas and that's all. Can't speak highly enough about this thing, GREAT WOOD SPLITTER, GREAT PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: I love this log splitter
customer_reviews.text: I love this log splitter. I just got back from my cabin in the woods where we split wood all day and this little beauty split every single log we placed on it no matter the size. I love the small compactness of this machine, it is easy to move around and transport in the back of my pickup truck. I was initially not happy when it arrive unassembled but my mechanic was able to put it together for me in an hour. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and has handled every chunk of wood ...
customer_reviews.text: Father's day present from my wife. It is easy to use and has handled every chunk of wood I placed on it. Wish I would have gotten it years ago!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed G

customer_reviews.title: greatly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: this was a present. Assembly was required just tried to use it for the first time. It does not split the logs we need to split. it won't even split a 6 in log. I want a refund. Where can I return this product back to .
customer_reviews.author: MARY R WEBB

customer_reviews.title: easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Product easy to put together. It started right up after putting in the oil. Easy to use - just the right size that it won't take up too much space. cuts the wood excellent. It's a Sweet Splitter! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this splitter! It works great for splitting wood for my home. It does need more hydraulic fluid when you first put it together and it does tend to leak out of the clear house.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace B

customer_reviews.title: works great for 1/2 hour - then key piece broke
customer_reviews.text: the piece on the return lever broke the first time i used it!!! i will try to contact company and see what they have to say, but clearly not well made for a piece that is crucial for operation
customer_reviews.author: Blakely F. Bundy

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have used this 7 ton log splitter 3 days now. it will split big logs with ease. however the biggest problem is the ground has to be real level or it will not work. this is a real pain out in the woods where we were working. Once we figured it out and leveled it out we worked like a charm. Engine is great starts real easy and is great on gas
customer_reviews.author: David B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together but make sure you have plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but make sure you have plenty of hydrolic oil - takes quite a bit to get it running smooth. Once we got it running smooth it works great. Good splitter for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible !
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after a day and took me a whole day to put together. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received on time descriptions incorrect it’s tiny wouldn’t split a pine cone plus wouldn’t run not even fire when I got it wouldn’t suggest purchasing this item
customer_reviews.author: Donald and Melinda George

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about a 7 ton vise a 25 ton but it works perfectly. I split wood that is max 15 inches long for my little fireplace. This handled logs that were up to 18 inches thick and up to 15 inches long with ease. One day I had all my wood split for the winter. Now if it would only stack it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this splitter
customer_reviews.text: I love the splitter, I've split 6 rick of wood with no problems. I would recommend this product. Lot of power in a small compact machine
customer_reviews.author: darryl r. devore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for its size!
customer_reviews.text: This is an impressive splitter for its size. It was easy to assemble and prepare for use. Instructions were clear and straight forward. We used it for a couple of hours the first time and it performed well beyond its rating. We split some pieces that were 24" across and it powered right through them! It sips gas and is not loud at all. Overall this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Al S.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves the 7-ton
customer_reviews.text: This Champion 7-ton is easy to use and easy to hand-pull to the next job. After using it for 30 min, my wife wants one of her own.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: suprisingly powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this splitter for about 3 hours so this is not a long term evaluation. Seems powerful for 7 tons. Assembly wasn't hard. Very happy with purchase. Gets through some fairly tough knots. The only complaint I would have thus far is that the hydraulic tank vent is kind of micky mouse. It drips oil constantly. Could have had a better design for that.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were clear and easy. Simple to operate. We split about a cord+ of wood the first day with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: John Burkett

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really hunts for the correct RPM range, it does work ok, but not as great as it appears in the videos
customer_reviews.author: Mknutson

customer_reviews.title: He has used it a lot and it does a great job and saves his back from not having to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. He has used it a lot and it does a great job and saves his back from not having to chop wood!!! It works fantastic!!1

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works great, my GF loves it since she no longer has to split wood with a maul. The shipping from UPS sucked, box was obviously dropped resulting in damage to the splitter but nothing I couldn't fix at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Compressor broke after third use, I should have just bought one from Home Depot or fleet farm. Now I have to try and ship it back

customer_reviews.title: ... birthday gift for my boyfriend he loves it it's easy to use just wish the handle was longer on ...
customer_reviews.text: So this was a birthday gift for my boyfriend he loves it it's easy to use just wish the handle was longer on it
customer_reviews.author: keirsten

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good size for the price, already put 6 hours on the machine and have had no problems and works very well. Simple to put together with good instructions. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Almost a great wood splitter
customer_reviews.text: The engine constantly stalls and the hydraulic fluid bleed valve always leaks even following the instructions. The unit does split wood great and it’s compact size is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only splits wood that has been split
customer_reviews.text: Engine stalls if you try splitting a log. Great for splitting split wood into smaller pieces only
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best purchase year! I cannot believe the power this has and the best part is that so easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Bill in the hills

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful machine
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money and easy to assemble. Shipment done on date and timeframe as promised. Machine worked wonderfully. I was able to split a cord in a 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent priduct.
customer_reviews.text: This product is super. My neighbor has a 40 year old Champion splitter. In fact he is ordering a new one because of the features my has
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product and easy to install - it works perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This unit exceeded my expectations. The only thing is the handle could be longer. So an old guy like me don't have to bend over so much.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Albert

customer_reviews.title: Saved me money
customer_reviews.text: Truly impressed with all the work and money I have saved on having to cute down and have my own personal fire place filled with wood and not have to pay for the wood and pay to have it delivered

customer_reviews.title: I recommend small bat tilt good.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best machines the I use for its size.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from Champion!
customer_reviews.text: This may be a fine product but I can't say because I am missing pieces to assemble it. I have tried contacting Champion Customer Sercive at the number they provide. However I sit on hold for hours at a time. Never getting to speak to anyone. I've tried 5 different days now and still cannot get through to anyone. I don it recommend buying from this company!

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with this item
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this item, my husband was able to slit at least 1-1/2 cords in just a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, portable, productive
customer_reviews.text: Great little splitter! Busts through 20” Rock Maple and works quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Vickerman

customer_reviews.title: Best little log splitter!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the log splitter! The size is perfect for easy moving yet it's big enough to handle anything I want to split.Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lite and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Split 2 full cords of white oak in 5 hours

customer_reviews.title: Works great Powerful Just wish it wasn't so ow to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great Powerful Just wish it wasn't so ow to the ground. I see a bench in the future

customer_reviews.title: ... of wood so far and this little guy does great! If the log is bigger we just cut ...
customer_reviews.text: We have cut four cords of wood so far and this little guy does great! If the log is bigger we just cut smaller chunks off till it can handle it. For the price and just cutting wood for a fireplace you can go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Missminiparker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: smaller than it looks but still gets the job done. Had it for over a year sitting outside still works
customer_reviews.author: kenneth,certain

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It had no power and I am very disgusted we could not return it. I will not order again.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable splitter!
customer_reviews.text: This little splitter is awesome! I am a 130lb female and this was very easy for me to move and operate. Went through 12-16in rounds easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I set mine up on a 6 foot table for better positioning. Runs like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price! I've now had it for 2 seasons, splitting all but the the largest rounds. It may take some time to get through the largest hunks, but if you turn log to optimal position this machine will split it. I set mine up on a 6 foot table for better positioning. Runs like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Short lifetime.
customer_reviews.text: I was enjoying this piece of equipment for 2 1/2 months. Doing a great job. Then it just quit working and although it is under warranty, cannot be returned. What a shame. Now I have to find someone who can fix it and have not figured out who will pay for the repairs.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Nater

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Item does not start properly, tech support not very supportive. Don't buy this item. Not worth the hassle

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked fine until I opened the box. The entire air cleaner assembly was shattered to pieces. Unable to return and cannot find parts anywhere.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great little tool works great, easy to move around, and not fussy at all love it

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: We received our new splitter, could not wait to try it out. It works great, Thank you very very much

customer_reviews.title: Champion power Equipment No.90720
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine one month ago and it is amazing. I've recently split three cords of fire wood with it. Its not a big machine but it is well worth its money. It uses very little gas. I recommend this machine if u don't have a lot of money to buy a big machine. absolutely no complaints with this machine. Will of Jacksonville North Carolina
customer_reviews.author: William Robert Hall

product_meta.title: Champion 7-Ton Compact Horizontal Gas Log Splitter with Auto Return
product_meta.description: The Champion Power Equipment 90720 7-Ton Horizontal Gas Log Splitter is small on size but big on power. If you’re looking for a quick, dependable and portable solution for log splitting, this is the unit for you. Depend on the reliable recoil start to start up the powerful Champion 80cc single-cylinder OHV engine, which features a cast-iron sleeve, a 0.4-gallon fuel tank, 0.4-quart oil capacity (recommended 10W-30) and a low-oil shutoff for safety. Never struggle to lift a large, heavy log onto your log splitter again. The low-profile design makes it much easier to load a large log onto the splitting beam, and the integrated log cradle keeps the log safely in position. This small but mighty machine handles logs up to 19 inches long, weighing up to 50 pounds. Seven tons of splitting capacity deliver the power you need for the job at hand. The hydraulic oil system has a 1.3-gallon oil capacity and operates at 3 gpm to power through tough logs. Champion designed this log splitter with a skewed wedge to increase splitting efficiency, plus it has a 20-second cycle time and dependable auto-return valve, which is capable of 180 cycles per hour. The 2-stage gear pump reliably adjusts flow and pressure by delivering high flow/low pressure when there is no resistance and low flow/high pressure when cutting through a log to increase productivity. This log splitter will fit easily in any truck bed, plus it’s easy to move from one job to the next with the comfortable handle and 10-inch never-flat tires. Assembly and setup are hassle free with Champion’s clear directions and thoughtful packaging. This log splitter is EPA certified and CARB compliant. Buy with confidence - our reliable support and network of service centers will back your purchase up with a 2-year limited warranty and FREE lifetime technical support.
feature_bullets: Champion’s 7-ton log splitter features an integrated log cradle and low profile for easy loading.
The 80cc engine easily powers through logs up to 19 inches in length and 50 lb. in weight.
The 20-second cycle time and auto-return valve reduce work time, while the skewed wedge improves efficiency.
Champion Support - 2 year limited warranty with FREE lifetime technical support
Hydraulic Oil Type-AW-32, Universal Hydraulic Oil, Automatic Transmission Fluid
